analysis.Summary: Vue 3 single-file component that renders a user profile icon as an inline SVG. It accepts a 'fill' prop for color and applies any passed CSS classes via $attrs.
analysis.Purpose: Provide a reusable, configurable profile icon throughout the application UI.

Components.name: IconProfile
Components.role: Renders the profile SVG, binds its fill color and CSS classes.

Functions.name: defineProps
Functions.description: Vue Composition API macro that declares props in a <script setup> block.

fill.description: Fill color of the SVG path.

Dependencies: No external icon library; self-contained SVG
analysis.Usage: Imported in any parent component via `import IconProfile from 'modules/icons/entities/IconProfile.vue'` and used in template as `<IconProfile fill="#FF0000" class="my-icon"/>`.
Notes: No <style> block; styling is fully controlled via CSS variables and passed classes.
Uses Vue 3 <script setup> syntax, so no explicit import of defineProps is shown.
Relies on $attrs.class to let consumers pass arbitrary CSS classes.
